name: MDLCheckerboardTexture
desc: A generator of texel data that creates a checkerboard pattern with two specified colors.

items.name: init(divisions: Float, name: String?, dimensions: vector_int2, channelCount: Int32, channelEncoding: MDLTextureChannelEncoding, color1: CGColor, color2: CGColor)
items.desc: Initializes a checkerboard texture with the specified colors and other properties.

items.name: var color1: CGColor?
items.desc: The color for half of the squares in the checkerboard pattern.

items.name: var color2: CGColor?
items.desc: The color for the other half of the squares in the checkerboard pattern.

items.name: var divisions: Float
items.desc: The number of squares along each dimension in the checkerboard pattern.
